title: Self-Regulated Learning Strategy Development for Higher Education Competency Assessment

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of intermediate-level courses in related fields or equivalent experience
context.additional_context: Competency diagnosis and learning plan development through interaction with self-assessment tools in a VR environment.

learning_goals: Learners can self-assess their competency levels with 80% accuracy in a VR simulation environment.
Learners can establish and execute a self-regulated learning plan linked to instructor feedback in three stages (planning-execution-monitoring).
Learners can revise and refine self-regulated learning strategies two or more times during the learning process using digital tools.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
